title: Testing Apple Vision Pro's Personas
description: Yeah. We finally get why it's in beta.  Subscribe:  Like The Verge on Facebook:  Follow on Twitter:  Follow on Instagram:  Follow on TikTok:   The Vergecast Podcast:  Decoder with Nilay Patel:   More about our podcasts:   Read More:  Community guidelines:  Wallpapers from The Verge:   Subscribe to The Vergecast on YouTube, new episodes on Wednesday and Friday:
transcript: Oh no. No. Within the new $3,500 Apple Vision Pro, there's a feature called Personas. It's in beta, but it's basically creating a digital avatar for you that will show up when you take video calls while wearing the Vision Pro. We're going to set them up today and see whose Persona looks the most like them. Oh my god, I'm nervous. Oh, this sucks. No. Ew. I look like my grandma. I look maybe 70 years old. My hair looks like a hat. Do I really look like this? The Personas feature is still in beta, it looks like it's got a long way to go.
